Structs/MultiViewConfiguration.html#/s:4.name: inputCount
Structs/MultiViewConfiguration.html#/s:4.abstract: The number inputs that are included in the multiview

Structs/MultiViewConfiguration.html#/s:4.name: multiviewCount
Structs/MultiViewConfiguration.html#/s:4.abstract: The number multiviews that can be generated

Structs/MediaPoolConfiguration.html#/s:4.name: stillCapacity
Structs/MediaPoolConfiguration.html#/s:4.abstract: The number of stills that can be stored

Structs/MediaPoolConfiguration.html#/s:4.name: clipCapacity
Structs/MediaPoolConfiguration.html#/s:4.abstract: The number of clips that can be stored

Structs/MixEffectConfiguration.html#/s:4.name: block
Structs/MixEffectConfiguration.html#/s:4.abstract: The block index. Starts counting at 0 so first block is 0

Structs/MixEffectConfiguration.html#/s:4.name: numberOfKeyers
Structs/MixEffectConfiguration.html#/s:4.abstract: The number of keyers on this block

Structs/Topology.html#/s:4Atem8TopologyV.name: downstreamKeyers
Structs/Topology.html#/s:4Atem8TopologyV.abstract: Number of downstream keyers. Tested using simulator and v8.2.1

Structs/Topology.html#/s:4Atem8TopologyV.name: mediaPlayers
Structs/Topology.html#/s:4Atem8TopologyV.abstract: Number of media players. Tested using simulator and v8.2.1

Structs/Topology.html#/s:4Atem8TopologyV.name: maxHyperdecks
Structs/Topology.html#/s:4Atem8TopologyV.abstract: Maximum number of linked hyperdecks. Tested using simulator and v8.2.1

Structs/Topology.html#/s:4Atem8TopologyV.name: unknownB
Structs/Topology.html#/s:4Atem8TopologyV.abstract: Unknown property, it might be the number of Digital Video Effects aka *DVE*s

Structs/SourceTallies.html#/s:4Atem13Sou.name: tallies
Structs/SourceTallies.html#/s:4Atem13Sou.abstract: The state of the tally lights for each source of the Atem switcher

Structs/AuxiliaryOutputChanged.html#/s:4.name: source
Structs/AuxiliaryOutputChanged.html#/s:4.abstract: The source that has been routed to the auxiliary output

Structs/AuxiliaryOutputChanged.html#/s:4.name: output
Structs/AuxiliaryOutputChanged.html#/s:4.abstract: The auxiliary output that has received another route

Structs/AuxiliaryOutputChanged.html#/s:4.name: init(source:output:)
Structs/AuxiliaryOutputChanged.html#/s:4.abstract: Create a message to inform that a source has been routed to an auxiliary output

Structs/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.html#/s:4A.name: source
Structs/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.html#/s:4A.abstract: The source that should be assigned to the auxiliary output

Structs/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.html#/s:4A.name: output
Structs/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.html#/s:4A.abstract: The auxiliary output that should be rerouted

Structs/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.html#/s:4A.name: init(_:to:)
Structs/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.html#/s:4A.abstract: Create a message to reroute an auxiliary output.

Structs/MessageTitle.html.name: MessageTitle
Structs/MessageTitle.html.abstract: An ASCII String of exactly 4 characters. A list of available titles can be found in Skarhoj’s protocol description under the column “CMD”.

Structs/ChangePreviewBus.html.name: ChangePreviewBus
Structs/ChangePreviewBus.html.abstract: Informs a switcher that the preview bus should be changed

Structs/ChangeProgramBus.html.name: ChangeProgramBus
Structs/ChangeProgramBus.html.abstract: Informs a switcher that the program bus shoud be changed

Structs/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.html.name: ChangeAuxiliaryOutput
Structs/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.html.abstract: Informs a switcher that a source should be assigned to the specified auxiliary output

Structs/AuxiliaryOutputChanged.html.name: AuxiliaryOutputChanged
Structs/AuxiliaryOutputChanged.html.abstract: Informs a controller that a source has been routed to an auxiliary output

Structs/PreviewBusChanged.html.name: PreviewBusChanged
Structs/PreviewBusChanged.html.abstract: Informs a controller that the preview bus has changed

Structs/ProgramBusChanged.html.name: ProgramBusChanged
Structs/ProgramBusChanged.html.abstract: Informs a controller that the program bus has changed

Structs/NewTimecode.html.name: NewTimecode
Structs/NewTimecode.html.abstract: Informs a controller that the switchers timecode has changed

Structs/ChangeTransitionPosition.html.name: ChangeTransitionPosition
Structs/ChangeTransitionPosition.html.abstract: Informs the switcher that it should update its transition position

Structs/TransitionPositionChanged.html.name: TransitionPositionChanged
Structs/TransitionPositionChanged.html.abstract: Informs the controller that the transition position has changed

Structs/InitiationComplete.html.name: InitiationComplete
Structs/InitiationComplete.html.abstract: Informs a controller that a connection is succesfully established.

Structs/SourceTallies.html.name: SourceTallies
Structs/SourceTallies.html.abstract: Informs a controller that the some tally lights might have changed.

Structs/ProtocolVersion.html.name: ProtocolVersion
Structs/ProtocolVersion.html.abstract: There are two version numbers in ATEM world: One for the ATEM Software Control application (for instance version 6.0) which is what people usually refers to and one for the firmware which is often updated with the PC/Mac application versions (for instance 2.15). The latter version number is what “_ver” gives you and a number you can not find anywhere in the application to our knowledge.

Structs/Topology.html.name: Topology
Structs/Topology.html.abstract: The topology of an atem describes all its resources: inputs, outputs, generators, etc.

Structs/TallyLight.html.name: TallyLight
Structs/TallyLight.html.abstract: Describes the state of a tally light. Possible values are

Protocols/SwitcherConnections.html#/s:4A.name: send(_:)
Protocols/SwitcherConnections.html#/s:4A.abstract: Queues a message to be sent to all connected controllers.

Protocols/SwitcherConnections.html#/s:4A.name: when(_:)
Protocols/SwitcherConnections.html#/s:4A.abstract: Attaches a message handler to a concrete Message type. Every time a message of this type comes in, the provided handler will be called with two parameters: the message itself and the origin of the message.

Protocols/Serializable.html#/s:4Atem12Se.name: dataBytes
Protocols/Serializable.html#/s:4Atem12Se.abstract: The part of the serialized message starting after the 4 Message.title bytes.

Protocols/Message.html#/s:4Atem7MessageP.name: title
Protocols/Message.html#/s:4Atem7MessageP.abstract: The title of the message. This is referred to as CMD in Skarhoj’s protocol documentation

Protocols/Message.html#/s:4Atem7MessageP.name: init(with:)
Protocols/Message.html#/s:4Atem7MessageP.abstract: Initialize a new message from the given binary string

Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.name: send(_:)
Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.abstract: Sends a message to the connected switcher.

Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.name: whenDisconnected
Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.abstract: A function that will be called when the connection is lost

Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.name: whenError
Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.abstract: A function that will be called when an error occurs

Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.name: when(_:)
Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.abstract: Attaches a message handler to a concrete Message type. Every time a message of this type comes in, the provided handler will be called.

Protocols/ControllerConnection.html.name: ControllerConnection
Protocols/ControllerConnection.html.abstract: A connection of a controller to a switcher. Use it to interact with the switcher: send messages and attach message handlers for incoming Messages.

Protocols/Message.html.name: Message
Protocols/Message.html.abstract: An interpreted message coming from an ATEM device

Protocols/Serializable.html.name: Serializable
Protocols/Serializable.html.abstract: A Message that is serializable. In other words: that can be transformed into a binary format, ready to be sent to another device.

Extensions/RawRepresentable.html#/s:SY4A.name: decode(from:)
Extensions/RawRepresentable.html#/s:SY4A.abstract: Factory method that tries to create a new instance for a Type that is RawRepresentable

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl4AtemE12.name: binarySearch(predicate:)
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl4AtemE12.abstract: Finds such index N that predicate is true for all elements up to

Enums/VideoSource/PropertiesChanged.html.name: PropertiesChanged
Enums/VideoSource/PropertiesChanged.html.abstract: The properties (like name and port types) of a video source

Enums/VideoSource.html.name: VideoSource
Enums/VideoSource.html.abstract: A unique identifier for a video source of an ATEM switcher

Classes/Switcher.html#/s:4Atem8SwitcherC.name: init(eventLoopGroup:setup:)
Classes/Switcher.html#/s:4Atem8SwitcherC.abstract: Start a switcher endpoint that controllers can interact with.

Classes/PureMessageHandler.html#/s:4Atem.name: when(_:)
Classes/PureMessageHandler.html#/s:4Atem.abstract: Attaches a message handler to a concrete Message type. Every time a message of this type comes in, the provided handler will be called.

Classes/ContextualMessageHandler.html#/s.name: when(_:)
Classes/ContextualMessageHandler.html#/s.abstract: Attaches a message handler to a concrete Message type. Every time a message of this type comes in, the provided handler will be called.

Classes/Controller.html#/s:4Atem10Contro.name: init(ipAddress:eventLoopGroup:setup:)
Classes/Controller.html#/s:4Atem10Contro.abstract: Start a new Controller that connects to an ATEM Switcher specified by its IP address.

Classes/Controller.html#/s:4Atem10Contro.name: send(message:)
Classes/Controller.html#/s:4Atem10Contro.abstract: Sends a message to the connected switcher.

Classes/ConnectionState.html.name: ConnectionState
Classes/ConnectionState.html.abstract: Stores all relevant information to keep an ATEM connection alive.

Classes/ContextualMessageHandler.html.name: ContextualMessageHandler
Classes/ContextualMessageHandler.html.abstract: A utility to parse RawMessages and call their attached handlers within a certain context.

Classes/PureMessageHandler.html.name: PureMessageHandler
Classes/PureMessageHandler.html.abstract: A utility to parse RawMessages and call their attached handlers.

Classes.html#/s:4Atem13MessageParserC.name: MessageParser
Classes.html#/s:4Atem13MessageParserC.abstract: A utility to parse binary messages and look up corresponding message handlers.

Classes/Switcher.html.name: Switcher
Classes/Switcher.html.abstract: An endpoint to interact with BMD ATEM controllers like “Atem Software Control” or any of the hardware control panels.
